message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, thanks for offering! That's a bit steep for me though. Would you consider $80?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $110. Let me know if that's more to your liking!
I appreciate you coming down, Alice, but $110 is still a bit more than I was hoping to spend. Could you do $90?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $105. That's the lowest I can go. Let me know if that's acceptable to you!
